name: forest bysen
dieMessage: the forest @c-bold-on@@c-magenta@bysen@c-reset@'s lifeless corpse falls to the forest floor.

attackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ swings off a tree branch to attack @player-name@!
The @npc-color-name@ prepares to swing his @c-green@forest@c-reset@axe at @player-name@!
The @npc-color-name@ darts in between trees to attack @player-name@!

criticalAttackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ raises his @c-green@forest@c-reset@ axe and swings it down with a violent motion, providing a @c-bold@@c-yellow@CRUSHING@c-reset@ blow to @player-name@!

The @npc-color-name@ growls and darts behind @player-name@, sending his @c-green@forest@c-reset@ axe directly into @player-name@'s back! @player-name@ is reeling from the @c-bold@@c-yellow@CRITICAL@c-reset@ attack!

idleMessages.message: A @npc-color-name@ ambles carefully through the surrounding forest.
